## 

Outreach has the capacity to catalyze change in a broad audience. It brings the world of science and nature to many and changes the way we think about the world around us. I hope to teach others about the problems our planet faces and the steps toward solutions, but above all, I hope that others are inspired by facts and feelings to appreciate the world around them a little bit more.
